response.original_title: The Music: Live at Temple Newsam
response.overview: The events marked the Kippax four pieceâ€™s first gigs together since 2011 and 20 years since their classic eponymously named debut album. With a warm up at the legendary Glasgow Barrowland selling out in under and hour and over 12,000 people filling the grounds of Temple Newsam House to celebrate the band's return - the set draws on songs from all three of the band's albums, with the legendary intensity and power that their live shows were always famed for.
response.tagline: Following their rapturously received comeback shows at Glasgow Barrowland and Leeds Temple Newsam Park earlier this year, The Music release a live album of the full Temple Newsam set and 4 video tracks.
response.title: The Music: Live at Temple Newsam
